alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Meagher County Valleys; Snowy and Judith Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 11 at 8:15PM MDT until April 14 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM WEDNESDAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 8 and 14 inches possible over mountain passes with higher amounts above 7500 feet. * WHERE...The Highwood, Little Belt, and Snowy Mountains, Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains, and Meagher County Valleys. * WHEN...From 6 PM Wednesday to Midnight MDT Thursday Night. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous.
info.instruction: To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Meagher County Valleys; Snowy and Judith Mountains
